data.event: Euro-American settlement began around 1800, and the county was formally organized in 1807 and named for Benjamin Franklin.
Euro-American settlement began around 1800, and the county was formally organized in 1807 and named for Benjamin Franklin.

event.title: the next several decades, the size of the county was reduced

data.event: During the next several decades, the size of the county was reduced several times by reorganizations which created the neighboring counties of Coffee County, Moore County, and Grundy County.
One of the most notable early settlers was frontiersman Davy Crockett, who came about 1812 but is not thought to have remained long.
